item.title: By: WC Lathe Werks Titanium Shift Knob | Grand Mighty
item.dc:creator: WC Lathe Werks Titanium Shift Knob | Grand Mighty
item.description: […] than the stock, slotted style lever for Camaros. The different threading meant I had to ditch the FEED shift knob, unfortunately. On the bright side, this enabled me to try a new direction and go with a product […]
item.content:encoded: […] than the stock, slotted style lever for Camaros. The different threading meant I had to ditch the FEED shift knob, unfortunately. On the bright side, this enabled me to try a new direction and go with a product […]

item.title: By: REVLUC
item.dc:creator: REVLUC
item.description:
Maybe re-wrap the factory RX8 knob to match your other bits (steering wheel/etc) and tie it all together perfectly???
I really love the rotary aspect of it, and the fact that it's an original Mazda part...
The Feed knob looks like "any other" aftermarket knob. (Though of course it is nice- cuz Feed.)
Things to think on.
item.content:encoded:
Maybe re-wrap the factory RX8 knob to match your other bits (steering wheel/etc) and tie it all together perfectly???

I really love the rotary aspect of it, and the fact that it’s an original Mazda part…

The Feed knob looks like “any other” aftermarket knob. (Though of course it is nice- cuz Feed.)

Things to think on.

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2012/08/cast-your-vote/#comment-37582">Uche</a>.
I did actually go FEED :-P
If you want the RX8 shift knob, email me!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Uche.

I did actually go FEED :-P

If you want the RX8 shift knob, email me!

item.title: By: Uche
item.dc:creator: Uche
item.description: Uhh, I'm gonna go with the 5speed RX8 shift knob, yo...and if you end up going with the FEED, let me get that off you, I have the 6speed one and really want the 5speed, it fits my FC3S :D
